title: Championship Ashe Chroma + Loading Screen Border & Icon
body: I have a question about this years Worlds rewards. If I get enough tokens to craft the Ashe chroma, will I automatically get the loading border and icon too or will I need to earn enough tokens for that separately?

replies.body: The loading screen and border need to be crafted separately through the loot options with those tokens afaik currently!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=FXh82y5A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-19T02:22:00.430+0000)
>
> The loading screen and border need to be crafted separately through the loot options with those tokens afaik currently!

Will there be an ample amount of tokens to get both?
If you get the world's masterpass there will be ample tokens to get both due to the masterpass completing all missions get you 540 tokens
How many tokens should I have by now if I've completed all quests?
If you have completed all of the quest (including the masterpass quests) you should have 255 tokens as of this moment.

Heyya! For the 120 point Ashe Border and Icon, do I have to equip the icon to make the border show up on my loading screen, or can I JUST equip the border? i already have an avatar I like but would like a custom border.

Additionally, does this border work on any champion, or only Ashe?
Most of the time you just need to have the icon unlocked on your account for the border to appear on that skin.
It's a border for Championship Ashe only. You don't equip the border, it automatically shows.
